content: I think I understand what you mean. I'd like to explore more about how to incorporate my experiences into my writing. I've had a lot of experiences related to writing and books, like participating in a online book club discussion on Facebook, where we talked about "The Power" by Naomi Alderman, or meeting up with friends at a local bookstore for a reading and Q&A session with bestselling author, James Patterson. How can I use these experiences to inform my world-building and characters?
